newsitem.title: USA: AT&T sets NCR share distribution.
newsitem.headline: AT&T sets NCR share distribution.

text.p: AT&T Corp. said Monday it will distribute 101.4 million shares of NCR Corp. when it spins off the subsidiary, which provides computer systems, software and automated teller machines, on Dec. 31.
The spin-off will complete AT&T's break-up into three companies, leaving AT&T solely in communication services.
AT&T said it decided on Friday to distribute to its shareholders 0.0625 NCR share for each AT&T share held.
As of Friday, AT&T had 1.62 billion shares outstanding.
New York-based AT&T's stock edged down 25 cents to $38.875 on the New York Stock Exchange at mid-afternoon.
